mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.subject AS subject, c.examineDistinct, c.name AS room FROM fjb.examine a LEFT JOIN fjb.examine_subject b ON a.subject_id = b.subject_id LEFT JOIN fjb.examine_room c ON a.room_id = c.room_id WHERE start_time>=#{now}

SELECT a.*, b.subject, c.examineDistinct, c.name room FROM fjb.examine a LEFT JOIN fjb.examine_subject b ON a.subject_id = b.subject_id LEFT JOIN fjb.examine_room c ON a.room_id = c.room_id WHERE a.start_time>=#{now} AND a.subject_id=#{subjectId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO examine (subject_id, room_id, start_time, end_time, sign_up, max_num) VALUES (#{subjectId}, #{roomId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{signUp}, #{maxNum})
